markdownRemark.excerpt: It seems that many people endeavor to be good at that and this and whatnot. Not that I am claiming that such act is useless, but it could just be better to…
markdownRemark.html: It seems that many people endeavor to be good at that and this and whatnot. Not that I am claiming that such act is useless, but it could just be better to focus on one single thing and reach some intermediate-ish level and get used to it. Then one could be a useful person because he/she can do at least one thing right.

frontmatter.title: Just do one thing right and that's going to be enough
